mapper.select: SELECT CDDATE, CDDD, CDDAYOFWEEK FROM COM_DATE CD WHERE CDYEAR=#{YEAR} AND CDMM=#{MONTH} ORDER BY CDDATE

SELECT SSNO, SDSEQ, SSTITLE, PK_SAWON_CODE, SDHOUR, SDMINUTE, FONTCOLOR FROM ( SELECT NULL SSNO, NULL SDSEQ, SHTITLE SSTITLE, NULL PK_SAWON_CODE, NULL SDHOUR, NULL SDMINUTE, SHCOLOR FONTCOLOR FROM SCH_HOLIDAY SH WHERE SHMONTH=TO_DATE(#{field2}, 'MM') AND SHDATE=TO_DATE(#{field2}, 'DD') AND SH.DELETEFLAG='N' UNION ALL SELECT SD.FK_SSNO, SDSEQ, SSTITLE, PK_SAWON_CODE, SD.SDHOUR, SD.SDMINUTE, NULL FONTCOLOR FROM SCH_DETAIL SD LEFT OUTER JOIN SCHEDULE SS ON SS.SSNO=SD.FK_SSNO WHERE SDDATE=#{field2} AND SS.DELETEFLAG='N' AND SS.SSISOPEN='Y' UNION ALL SELECT SD.FK_SSNO, SDSEQ, SSTITLE, PK_SAWON_CODE, SD.SDHOUR, SD.SDMINUTE, NULL FONTCOLOR FROM SCH_DETAIL SD LEFT OUTER JOIN SCHEDULE SS ON SS.SSNO=SD.FK_SSNO WHERE SDDATE=#{field2} AND SS.DELETEFLAG='N' AND SS.SSISOPEN='N' AND PK_SAWON_CODE=#{field1} )DS ORDER BY SDHOUR, SDMINUTE, SSNO

SELECT SSTITLE, SSTYPE, SSSTARTDATE, SSSTARTHOUR, SSSTARTMINUTE, SSENDDATE, SSENDHOUR , SSENDMINUTE, SSREPEATTYPE, SSREPEATEND, SSCONTENTS, SSISOPEN, TC.FK_SAWON_CODE, SAWON_NAME FROM SCHEDULE TC INNER JOIN SAWON CU ON TC.FK_SAWON_CODE=CU.PK_SAWON_CODE
ORDER BY SSNO DESC
LIMIT ${rowStart-1}, 10
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCHEDULE(SSNO, SSTITLE, SSTYPE, SSSTARTDATE, SSSTARTHOUR, SSSTARTMINUTE, SSENDDATE, SSENDHOUR, SSENDMINUTE, SSREPEATTYPE, SSREPEATOPTION, SSREPEATEND, SSCONTENTS, SSISOPEN, FK_SAWON_CODE, UPDATEDATE, INSERTDATE, DELETEFLAG) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(SSNO)+1,0) FROM SCHEDULE), #{SSTITLE}, #{SSTYPE, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{SSSTARTDATE}, #{SSSTARTHOUR}, #{SSSTARTMINUTE}, #{SSENDDATE}, #{SSENDHOUR}, #{SSENDMINUTE}, #{SSREPEATTYPE}, #{SSREPEATOPTION, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{SSREPEATEND}, #{SSCONTENTS}, #{SSISOPEN}, #{FK_SAWON_CODE}, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi'), to_char(sysdate,'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi'), 'N')
INSERT INTO SCH_DETAIL(FK_SSNO, SDSEQ, SDDATE, SDHOUR, SDMINUTE) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(FK_SSNO)+1,0) FROM SCH_DETAIL), #{SDSEQ}, #{SDDATE}, #{SDHOUR}, #{SDMINUTE})
mapper.select: SELECT SSNO, SSTITLE, SSTYPE, SSSTARTDATE, SSSTARTHOUR, SSSTARTMINUTE, SSENDDATE, SSENDHOUR , SSENDMINUTE, SSREPEATTYPE, SSREPEATOPTION, SSREPEATEND, SSCONTENTS, SSISOPEN, TC.FK_SAWON_CODE, SAWON_NAME FROM SCHEDULE TC INNER JOIN SAWON CU ON TC.FK_SAWON_CODE=CU.PK_SAWON_CODE WHERE TC.DELETEFLAG='N' AND SSNO=#{SSNO}

SELECT SSNO, SSTITLE, CC1.CODENM SSTYPE, SSSTARTDATE, SSSTARTHOUR, SSSTARTMINUTE, SSENDDATE, SSENDHOUR , SSENDMINUTE, SSREPEATTYPE, CC2.CODENM SSREPEATTYPENM, SSREPEATEND, SSCONTENTS, CC3.CODENM SSISOPEN, TC.FK_SAWON_CODE, SAWON_NAME FROM SCHEDULE TC INNER JOIN SAWON CU ON TC.FK_SAWON_CODE=CU.PK_SAWON_CODE INNER JOIN COM_CODE CC1 ON CC1.CODECD=TC.SSTYPE AND CC1.CLASSNO=4 INNER JOIN COM_CODE CC2 ON CC2.CODECD=TC.SSREPEATTYPE AND CC2.CLASSNO=5 INNER JOIN COM_CODE CC3 ON CC3.CODECD=TC.SSISOPEN AND CC3.CLASSNO=6 WHERE TC.DELETEFLAG='N' AND SSNO=#{SSNO}
SELECT CODECD, CODENM FROM COM_CODE WHERE CLASSNO=#{CLASSNO} -- AND DELETEFLAG='N' ORDER BY CAST(CODECD AS INT)

SELECT CLASSNO, CODECD, CODENM FROM (SELECT ROWNUM as NO, CLASSNO, CODECD, CODENM FROM COM_CODE TB ORDER by CLASSNO, CODECD) A
AND NO BETWEEN ${rowStart-1} AND ${rowStart+9}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COM_CODE(CLASSNO, CODECD, CODENM) VALUES (#{CLASSNO}, #{CODECD}, #{CODENM})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM COM_CODE WHERE CLASSNO=#{CLASSNO} AND CODECD=#{CODECD}
